$description: Animation durations and easing. Subtle and functional — no decorative motion.

normal.$description: Sidebar collapse, modal open, tab switch

slow.$description: Page transitions, accordion expand, drawer slide

rules.reducedMotion: Always wrap animations in @media (prefers-reduced-motion: no-preference). Disable all motion when user prefers reduced motion.
rules.transforms: Prefer transform and opacity for animations — they are GPU-accelerated and don't trigger layout reflow.
rules.noDecoration: Never add motion purely for decoration. Every animation must serve a functional purpose: indicating state change, guiding attention, or providing spatial context.
